title: Effective Multimedia Content Design and Utilization in Web-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: An online course for employees to strengthen social-sector job competencies. Includes real-time interaction and project-based assessments using learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can effectively integrate multimedia content types (videos, infographics, quizzes, etc.) to design educational materials within an LMS
Learners can produce educational content applying multimedia design principles (cognitive load minimization, clarity enhancement, etc.) in web-based environments
Learners can collaborate with team members to develop multimedia resources aligned with project themes and share them via LMS uploads

resources: Multimedia Authoring Tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Spark)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
